website_summaries.verdict: Works successfully on nearly any type of beard, softening the facial hair to deliver a smooth shave.
pros: Helps the razor cut through the hairs easily, while protecting sensitive skin from the blade
Contains primarily natural oils and botanicals as ingredients
Uses an unscented formula, so it will work well for both women and men
cons: Doesn’t include a dropper that would simplify application

customer_reviews.title: My husband AND I love it
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman. My husband talked me into giving this product a try due to my sensitive skin when it comes to shaving. I must say, out of all my years of shaving, I have never had such a close shave without irritation. I love this product! I think I may just have to dab into my husband's stash from now on! I don't write reviews often so this says a lot coming from me. Oh and my husband loves it too. He's been using it for about 2 1/2 years now. I am mad that I am just discovering its greatness now.
customer_reviews.author: MemeC

customer_reviews.title: Great pre-shave oil, but the price is WAY above what it needs to be
customer_reviews.text: It's about $10 more than it's worth, but it is the best-quality pre-shave oil available. I've tried Maggard's, Stirling, another brand. The second best is Stirling for $12, a pretty close second. The AOS shave oil is a bit thicker and richer. I think the only reason I ordered this again over Stirling is that Prime shipping gets it to me in two days versus waiting 3-5 days for Stirling to get it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lanessar

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but superfluous unless you've a really heavy beard, is my guess.
customer_reviews.text: I'm beginning to think I really don't need to use pre-shave oil, having done so for several years now. I've begun whipping my shaving cream to a lather directly on my face and don't notice any increased difficulty or "pain" when not using the oil, which has a tendency to introduce a sticky coating to my sink in any case. It's best function probably is in trapping moisture in your beard bristles if you shave having only washed your face. After a hot shower, this doesn't seem necessary. I don't have a particularly tough beard, though. Only average, I'd say.
customer_reviews.author: Ned Leonard

customer_reviews.title: DON'T USE WITH ELECTRIC RAZOR
customer_reviews.text: Yeah so I learned this the hard way: DON'T USE WITH AN ELECTRIC RAZOR (even if it's a wet/dry one). It gummed it up awfuland all the hair got stuck around the gummy bits... It wasn't pretty. Had to replace it. :/
customer_reviews.author: L. Venema

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT unscented
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for an unscented pre-shave oil as I'm trying a sampler pack of shaving creams. This oil has a definite scent, which one review, I read after purchase :(, described as a hybrid of eucalyptus, pine and clove. To me the scent is leans more towards clove. (FWIW my wife hates it.) The oil is very thick and remains on the skin even after shaving is complete. Disappointing, and I doubt I'll use the rest of it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not terribly impressed
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of good pre-shave oils on the market these days. Many of them with a rather pleasant scent. Although this claims to be unscented, it smells more like rancid nut oil to me. Think of one of your cooking oils that's been sitting around too long., That's the scent I get from this. I will not be re-ordering the product. I much prefer several other pre-shave oils that are in the same price range.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Gone are the days of Edge and Barbasol! I have been shaving my head since I was on tour with a band in 1997. I can't say enough about The Art Of Shaving products - everything from pre-shave, to shaving cream and after-shave balm. All their products are superior and I can't say enough good things about them. I will likely never use anything else - ever. My only regret is that I hadn't heard of this brand earlier. The high-quality products (all) last longer than I expected. They always arrive on time and are securely packaged. Extremely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Hogenson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gone are the days of Edge and Barbasol! I have been shaving my head since I was on tour with a band in 1997. I can't say enough about The Art Of Shaving products - everything from pre-shave, to shaving cream and after-shave balm. All their products are superior and I can't say enough good things about them. I will likely never use anything else - ever. My only regret is that I hadn't heard of this brand earlier. The high-quality products (all) last longer than I expected. They always arrive on time and are securely packaged. Extremely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Hogenson

customer_reviews.title: Feel the difference
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the pre-shave oil for about 5 years now. Recently, I ran out and decided to try shaving without it a few times. I definitely realized the difference! My skin was much more irritated and my face was much more dried out without the oil. I am ordering again ASAP. Only issue is that my razor does get clogged when I use the oil. It's worth it not to have dry, irritated skin all day though.
customer_reviews.author: nikestories

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This is marketed as unscented, but does have a faint scent to it. When applying to skin, this brand does not seem as oily as other brands. This will probably sound strange, but it actually feels a little dry. Bottom line is i tried it, I'll use it until it's gone, but i will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Good product terrible value
customer_reviews.text: Works well but it is so much cheaper and more effective to mix your own. I got a large bottle of castor oil, olive oil, and a 8 oz amber container for less than one of these. Adding a bit of the olive oil as 3:1 helped with the slickness as well. You can add a few drops of essential oils to make a scent if you need one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jackson III

customer_reviews.title: Preshave oil really makes a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have very thick facial hair, and I shave my scalp, so a preshave oil seems to make a huge difference in getting a smooth shave. I use Art of Shaving chave cream and after shave balm as well, and recommend all their products!
customer_reviews.author: A. Prine

customer_reviews.title: Loyal customer for years because it really works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband which he has been using this product for years. He suffers from ingrown hair on his face and this really helps with lifting those hairs so he can shave them. It also makes his face feel nice and prepped for the harsh shaver. it's awesome that Amazon sells this because for some reason this brand has been discontinued in many stores such as Macys, Nordstrom, and Lord and Taylor and they even closed down the actual store in our malls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not truly "unscented"
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty subtle and I actually like it, but for anyone interested in the unscented aspect of this - there is a scent. Kind of earthy/musky, a similar scent you'd experience with other shave products. The quality of the oil is great and works awesome for shaving, though I find it a bit overpriced for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: Allen V.

customer_reviews.title: Pre shave
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a lot of pre shave gels but this one is it for me. It gets off in your pours and you don’t cut yourself
customer_reviews.author: Chew

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pre-Shave Oil
customer_reviews.text: I started using the Art of Shaving products a few years ago. At the time, my shaving cream (from another brand) was reformulated, so I saw these products in one of the Art of Shaving stores. I bought a trial pack and have been hooked ever since. This is a nice thick pre-shave oil. You only need to use a small amount and spread it on your beard prior to applying your choice of shaving cream. It seems to last a reasonable amount of time. Last time I bought sandalwood and I would buy that scent next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lawtech

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil, I have had it for about 1 year now and use it everytime I shave. I have been told by many barbers that I have wire hair since it is so tough. This oil just softens my facial hair right up and makes it very easy to glide my razor and finish shaving faster and more efficient than before. I will be buying more, buying for gifts and buying other products they offer
customer_reviews.author: Ao Bella

customer_reviews.title: Way too thick. Difficult to apply. Difficult to rinse.
customer_reviews.text: Way too thick. This is like trying to smear 10W-40 on your face... Actually, 10W-40 would be easier. It is very difficult to rinse off the blade and your hands. You will have to scrub your sink after each shave. The hair will stick to the side of your sink like glue. I am a little worried how this product would cause build up in the pipes after prolong use. If you buy and use this product you should also have a jug of Draino on hand... Seriously, I'm not kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The Art of Shaving products have changed my life to the better
customer_reviews.text: I have had ingrown hairs on my neck caused by shaving since I was in high school in 1970. After watching a CD on using The Art of Shaving products I have eliminated an issue that has been ongoing for over forty years. I now shave after showering, using this pre-shave oil, saving cream and non alcohol after shave balm. Gratful this is behind me now.
customer_reviews.author: DonMerry

customer_reviews.title: I've been using the product for years. Makes shaving ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the product for years. Makes shaving more enjoyable, less knicks and cuts.They make a smaller version in a plastic container which I prefer but it is not available online. Easier to order online then to drive to nearest shop that sells this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kerner

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricy
customer_reviews.text: I have decided to go with the bald look and so I have a lot to shave every week.I have not found a better oil than this one to prepare for my shave. The price however is high. Too high for me considering the alternatives which are not as good but way cheaper, that is with a better ratio quality/price.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Use to like it a lot but it clogged my drain and I found better oils out there
customer_reviews.text: I got hooked on using Pre-shave oil using the Art of Shaving (AoS) stuff. Loved the smell of the AoS Lavender Pre-shave oil. I have since tried others brands and even made my own. The Art of Shaving oils have castor oils which makes it very thick and gummy. It will also clog your drain so be very aware- You have been warned. When I was using the Art of Shaving Oils I had to unclog my drain every month !!! Check out the organic Pre-shave oils out there on Amazon - they are better for your skin and for your drain.
customer_reviews.author: Wazzuup

customer_reviews.title: He has uber sensitive skin so I thought this would help him ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He has uber sensitive skin so I thought this would help him out. He says that it is quite oily and he has to really wash his hands to get it off. I also bought him a shaving brush and shave soap, and he says the shave soap is enough to get the oil off his skin. But my goodness, even with a disposable razor this is the closest shave he has ever gotten. He also doesn't get bumps nearly as much. We agree it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and it great for my sensitive skin. I save shipping by buying it here.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Z.

customer_reviews.title: This is not unscented!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not unscented!! The oil smells like cloves and other spices. I use Art of Shaving unscented shaving cream and after shave balm and love them. I am going to throw this away.
customer_reviews.author: Ajit N Maira

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband's birthday. He loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's birthday. He loves this product line and it works out well when you want to wear another scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: ... day since he is in the Army and his poor face was constantly irritated
customer_reviews.text: My husband has to shave every day since he is in the Army and his poor face was constantly irritated. He started using this and the cream and it is a completely different story now. His face is so soft, no irritation in site and he has begun to enjoy his morning shaving ritual. A little bit goes a very long way ( this bottle will last 6 months easy even shaving every day.)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but don't like the feel
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin so I like using a pre-shave. I usually use Proraso's pre-shave, but I decided to give this a try based on reviews. It seemed to work well because I did not get any irritation during shaving, but I do not like the consistency. It is like smearing your face with olive oil and feels kinda gross. The smell is a little off-putting too. I will stick with Proraso.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Looking to triple the amount of time it takes you to shave in the morning?
customer_reviews.text: Clogs up my razor. I literally have to use my power water floss machine to blast my razor clean... it clogs up after just one or two strokes and regular sink water doesn't have enough pressure to even clean it. It turns shaving my face into a 20 min project.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pre-shave prep
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. A little pricey but it pretty much beats any other pre-shave oil I've tried. Got hooked on this when I went for a Royal shave experience at an AoS barber.
customer_reviews.author: chuckco

customer_reviews.title: For best results, dry your face after taking a shower
customer_reviews.text: Shaving no longer irritates my skin thanks to this product. I'm able to shave more often with it. The bottle looks quite small but lasts a while because you only need about 10-15 drops of it per shave. For best results, dry your face after taking a shower, then apply this stuff, followed by a high quality shave cream, and use a high quality razor.
customer_reviews.author: SK41332

customer_reviews.title: I've got really thick facial hair, and this has ...
customer_reviews.text: I've got really thick facial hair, and this has helped with shaving a lot and lasted a really long time. Definitely worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Ame

customer_reviews.title: there is a faint piney scent that I really enjoy. You don't need to use much if your ...
customer_reviews.text: The Art of Shaving Pre-Shave Oil definitely helps lube-up my beard for an easier shave. While it is supposed to be unscented, there is a faint piney scent that I really enjoy. You don't need to use much if your face and hands are already wet, and this bottle should last me about six months when shaving five days a week.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: A very nice shave oil
customer_reviews.text: A very nice shave oil. It lubricaits well and should be a part of you wet shave ritual. Use of a shave oil in addition to a high quality soap will help reduce cuts and insure a smooth close shave. This product, while pricy does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Rose A. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: It works better if you shave with classic razors (Safety and straight) ...
customer_reviews.text: The reviews I've read could have many different possibilities as to why they didn't find it effective. It's not as sticky as everyone says, it all depends on the amount you put. It works better if you shave with classic razors (Safety and straight) BC when you shave with a modern razor, it prevents the full intended pull of the hair. As to why I gave a 4 star review... I don't feel like they give you enough! But overall I will continue to buy this product in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: A shaving treatment that has achieved class proportions.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I used Khiels products for all of my face care until I discovered this shaving oil to be superior. Give it a try, you won't be disappointed. Now if they would just start carrying Bay Rum. I have discovered that a well-groomed man is best served by classic combinations.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Blair

customer_reviews.title: It helps make a super smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. I am very impressed. It helps make a super smooth shave. I am very sensitive to smell and this has a light fresh clean smell. It is great. I will continue to repurchase this Shave Oil for him.
customer_reviews.author: S. Embry

customer_reviews.title: it works incredibly well and I do not recommend safety or straight razor shaving without it
customer_reviews.text: Most products in this category are overpriced and this is no different. However, it works incredibly well and I do not recommend safety or straight razor shaving without it. I went without preshave oil for years because of the cost. Never again. This type of product is more important than cream or soap in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried other brands but this has been the best value and best brand.
customer_reviews.author: EmRH

customer_reviews.title: Best Shave Oil Out There
customer_reviews.text: Art of Shaving is the best oil I have used. Thick shave oil perfect for a good shave, lubricates the face well. Large bottle lasts months of daily shaving. Have used Lemon and Unscented. Unscented is a misnomer, more like natural scent. Smells like the clove oil it contains.
customer_reviews.author: Rcnoble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stuff - second only to the Anthony shave oil in my experience (and only marginally).
customer_reviews.author: Rob C

customer_reviews.title: Work great and smells even better
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff. Great close shave with no razor burn. Leaves a pleasant manly smell that lasts all day long. Will buy again. This bottle will last me about a year shaving 2-3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Reed C.

customer_reviews.title: As added by previous reviews it does have a small ...
customer_reviews.text: As added by previous reviews it does have a small to it, but its natural smell of the oils, it's sticky as it should be, allows the blade to glide well. I will be buying a batch in the future after my first trail.
customer_reviews.author: Arzo Arsalan

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product as it has helped me to get a better shave, my skin does not irritate as much since I started using this and the having is a lot smoother and easier to do every time I use this product.
customer_reviews.author: lecm8

customer_reviews.title: I tend to get very bad razor burn
customer_reviews.text: I tend to get very bad razor burn, but if I apply this before shaving, I can shave every day and not see one razor bump.
customer_reviews.author: BRV

customer_reviews.title: Gave a good smooth shave using Col
customer_reviews.text: Use it one time only. I had to much come out the first time. I would normally use maybe half of that. Therefore, my face was well lubicated. Gave a good smooth shave using Col. Conk Almond. Look forward to using it again and comparing against Truffitt and Hill.
customer_reviews.author: HAS

customer_reviews.title: Art of shaving
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shave oil my only complaint is that the price is on the high side but it’s Art of shaving you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: The Art of Shaving products feel like a luxury product (which they are) and the use of the pre-shave oil in combination with the shaving cream gives you that awesome shaving experience. I really love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The other reviews are correct, awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been shaving with a single blade 'safety' razor for some time and have not been able to get the great shave people seem to claim such a razor gives, until l tried this magic shaving oil. The difference with/without this oil is amazing, your skin feels smooth and it does reduce irritation, especially under the chin where I used to get a lot of razor burn. I paired this with a shaving soap but I could see using just the oil to shave off a day's growth. Buy it, you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: stephen a

customer_reviews.title: in all the years I've been shaving, I never ...
customer_reviews.text: in all the years I've been shaving, I never realized that I had been missing a step, several really. Adding the pre shave to my routine has changed the experience totally. Razor burn is significantly reduced .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: LOverhis tried shaving without this.. never again this also lasted me about6-8 months
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K. Wholey

customer_reviews.title: Better than average
customer_reviews.text: It does help with the smoothness of the shave, but there is better out there. Gilette is pretty proud of their stuff as this is pretty expensive in my opinion. This is NOT unscented, but is a good scent.
customer_reviews.author: Wigglebutt

customer_reviews.title: I have always used this product and it is nice to find it on amazon since the closest store ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this product and it is nice to find it on amazon since the closest store that I can buy this at is inside a very crowded mall about an hour away. I am sure there are probably cheaper and equal quality products to this out there but I have not ran into one yet.
customer_reviews.author: JEV425

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product that protect your skin and leave your skin ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that protect your skin and leave your skin very smooth.This is the second time that I order this pre-shave oil.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a spa-like scent even though it says "unscented." And cheaper than the the store in the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best pre-shave on the market, and wonderful scent despite being "unscented". Use it for my daily shave every shave.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Tork

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive parts!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and doesn't smell. Great for sensitive areas paired with their shaving cream! It's pretty hard to cut yourself using these products.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money....
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect lube for my skin before adding shaving cream and shaving. Only need a small amount so bottle lasts along time. As with all of the Art of Shaving products, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gut Reaction Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: This definitely makes shaving a smoother process. I wouldn't recommend it for cartridge razors, as it will likely clog them up. But it works great for my safety razors. Because of its high price, I don't actually apply it everywhere. But I definitely use it on more sensitive areas, such as around my mouth and Adams Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Roughin' It

customer_reviews.title: Worth the high price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. It went over so well we repurchased it, which says a lot considering how stingy the person actually using the oil is.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: The oil for shaving I've been searching for!
customer_reviews.text: Got this oil on the recommendation of my brother, after complaining about razor burn and cuts. Just a little dab of this goes a long way and ever since I started using it I don't get burns or cuts. Simply put..."Get this now"
customer_reviews.author: J.L. Cragle

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Oil.
customer_reviews.text: This oil is very thick. Only need to apply a small amount. This along with shaving cream creates an oily shave
customer_reviews.author: Lori Stoudmire

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for a comfortable shave
customer_reviews.text: Using the pre shave oil gives a better, less iritating shave, plain and simple. There may be a less expensive product but so far I haven't found something that works the same and costs less. Stick with this. Use a good after shave balm and you will feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan of this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oil for use with my Japanese straight razor. I expected it to be slick and provide a smooth oil surface to help with shaving. The oil was much thicker than I expected. It's almost like a glue feeling, whereas I was expecting it to be more like the shaving strip on a Mach 3. I'm still not sure if it helps matters or provides any improvement while shaving. I have not really enjoyed using it, because it's so thick and is really rather unpleasant to apply to your skin. I personally can't really see that it accomplishes all that much over just a normal shave with soap.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johns

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality oil that works quite well
customer_reviews.text: If you shave with any kind of blade, a pre-shave oil is a must have. Makes a huge difference. This is a good quality oil that works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W homeyer

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. Would give it 5 stars but for the high price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Huszczo

customer_reviews.title: Art of Shaving morning ritual worth the added expense.
customer_reviews.text: Really, really works in setting up beard for my best shave. And I am 58 years old, shaving a long time. Expensive, yes but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay W. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I love this shave oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this shave oil, but it is expensive. I highly recommend getting a "Mr Misto" to apply it more evenly, and last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this smell and so does he and he also ...
customer_reviews.text: Works and smells just the the ones i bought my boyfriend from the actual store. Love this smell and so does he and he also loves the entire line
customer_reviews.author: Jugger

customer_reviews.title: Best product for razor burn
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for pre-shave oil for a while and used MANY products (depilatory to high end). This is by far the best - it preps my skin perfectly for the shave. I love these products and highly recommend them all.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice but unsure of effect
customer_reviews.text: I've only just started using a safety razor and am unsure of the actual effect it has on my shave, but I do feel it makes my face smoother afterward and allows the razor to move better. Might try other options next to compare.
customer_reviews.author: SteoanK

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest for pre-shave. No more razor burn and smells nice, not overpowering!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Unscented. Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my husband. He loves the Art of Shaving products.
customer_reviews.author: DFC

customer_reviews.title: Decent product. Expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I found it made my shave sometimes a little more of a hassle. It's a little too thick of a coating on my face. I would almost recommend shaving with it alone.
customer_reviews.author: M T

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: The best pre shave oil for guys with sensitive skin. Avoid nicks and cuts and razor burn. Use this oil before your shaving cream and you will be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Vic R.

customer_reviews.title: No point, no help
customer_reviews.text: I hate shaving. This doesn't help at all and makes the process longer and annoying and no more effective. I don't know. It smells good and is nice but I do not see the point
customer_reviews.author: FindingAnswers

customer_reviews.title: its good, but i find i dont need it to ...
customer_reviews.text: its good, but i find i dont need it to have a great shave.use your money on great cream like ART OF SHAVE , and a SILVER TIP BRUSH
customer_reviews.author: joe hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son at Christmas. He says this oil has really made shaving easier.
customer_reviews.author: VaBeachMomma

customer_reviews.title: Not quite
customer_reviews.text: This product did not seem to be the same as other Art of Shaving Pre-Shave Oil Unscented that I purchased from the Art of Shaving store. The consistency, clarity, and overall product are not the same. The Art of Shaving store oil was clear when looking "through" the bottle, while this was opaque.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Thunder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always gives me a smooth shave and a nice post-shave feel
customer_reviews.author: Apollo Gowa

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the unscented. Does the job. I use the 2oz to refill my mini-bottles for travelling
customer_reviews.author: MadHatter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best line of shaving products I've ever used and the oil is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: MJG

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes the biggest difference in the world! Use it with the Art of Shaving soap (not the cream), and their after shave balm, and kiss razor burn and ingrown hairs goodbye! It costs more, but worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: LostJohnny

customer_reviews.title: This product works. I miss it now that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works. I miss it now that I have run out. I tried substituting olive oil, but it is not the same. I would have given it five stars, but for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kevin White

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this but not that we are into using essential oils we make our own and it works just the same. Just a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: KY Family G

customer_reviews.title: A must pre-shave
customer_reviews.text: Art of Shaving is the only product I use to shave with. The oil goes on smooth and will not leave a film on your face. Makes my razor glide with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Wrench

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, and I don't shave without it. Significantly reduces razor burn and irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING stuff. Makes shaving something to look forward to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pre Shave Oil.
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the Art of saving product. Not cheap,but very quality products. I have a very heavy beard, and a very sensitive skin, so this oil help to achive a great shave.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: A bit too viscous
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but it's too thick for my liking,
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Gives a great close shave and is a bit of luxury in ...
customer_reviews.text: its expensive but worth the price. Gives a great close shave and is a bit of luxury in a bottle
customer_reviews.author: Milly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not unscented. Truly a nasty pine smell. I will only use it because of how expensive it is.
customer_reviews.author: TheBDP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products. These products make an art out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent products. These products make an art out of something a man must do routinely.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

customer_reviews.title: but there are much better products out there
customer_reviews.text: It becomes gummy immediately, so it is awkward trying to rub it into my beard. It does help, but there are much better products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Pechner

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: I personally didn't like it...used it only a few times, but that was because of how messy the oil was. I was expecting the oily feeling, but this is thicker than what I hoped...
customer_reviews.author: Icemoon

customer_reviews.title: Best shave in my life
customer_reviews.text: I started using the Art of Shaving products a few years ago and love them. I have sensitive skin but no more problems with razor burn or ingrown hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty in LA

customer_reviews.title: Improve your shave!
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel and smell! Get a great lather using this product.
customer_reviews.author: woco84@aol.com

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I use it all the time for a close smooth shave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and does the job
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves this and I love the way it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Green

customer_reviews.title: Best shave oil I have tried yet
customer_reviews.text: Best shave oil I have tried yet. Only complaint: 1 of my 4 bottles so far has had a slight scent. It must be made in the same factory as the scented variety.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Franklin
